name: Felip
description:
'''Felip Jhon Suson''' (born January 12, 1997) is a Filipino [[Pinoy pop|singer]], songwriter, [[Pinoy hip-hop|rapper]] and dancer. '''Felip''' is the main dancer member of the Filipino [[boy band]] [[SB19]], which debuted in 2018 and has become the leading [[Pinoy pop|P-pop]] group, under the [[stage name]] '''Ken'''. Although Felip is known for his distinctively deep voice, he has also displayed a wide vocal range.

Felip goes [[Mononym|by his first name]] outside [[SB19 discography|his music with SB19]]. He made his solo debut with "Palayo" (2021), a slow [[R&B]] track, which was followed by "[[Bulan (song)|Bulan]]" (2022). His [[extended play]] ''COM•PLEX'' (2023) and his [[album]] ''7sins'' (2024) are more [[Hip hop music|hip hop]]–oriented. Honouring his roots as a [[Cebuano language|Cebuano]] speaker from Zamboanga del Sur, Felip has performed in Cebuano in addition to [[Filipino language|Filipino]] and [[English language|English]].
